alert.note: Alert for Fairbanks Metro Area; Goldstream Valley and Nenana Hills (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 12 at 1:53PM AKST until November 13 at 2:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 2 PM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Fairbanks Metro Area, Goldstream Valley and Nenana Hills. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 2 PM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and reduced visibility on roads during the Monday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snowfall is expected from 6 AM to 10 AM Monday, with snowfall rates of 0.5 to 1 inch per hour in this time period of the morning commute. Snowfall gradually becomes lighter by Monday midday as off and on snow showers last into Monday night. An additional accumulation of one or two inches is possible Monday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling, especially during the Monday morning commute. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Fairbanks Metro Area; Goldstream Valley and Nenana Hills
